name: The Scaffold
description: '''The Scaffold''' are a comedy, poetry and music trio from [[Liverpool]], England, consisting of musical performer [[Mike McGear]], poet [[Roger McGough]] and comic entertainer [[John Gorman (entertainer)|John Gorman]]. They are perhaps most notable for their successful singles "[[Thank U Very Much (The Scaffold song)|Thank U Very Much]]" (1967) and the UK number 1 "[[Lily the Pink (song)|Lily the Pink]]" (1968). Since initially disbanding in 1977, the group have occasionally re-formed for performances and projects.
